name: Slime Ranch
description:
Create your slug farm!
Arming with a magnetic cannon that would catch as many slugs as you are a lizun hunter.
Your task in the game is to fulfill orders for the slime trick, you store them on the farm.
You will like the slides game.

In the game you will find a beautiful cartoon graphics, and much more.

The game implemented a large number of weapons, you choose the best, just build a trap that would catch the slimes.
